mcq.statement: Choose the correct statement: Graphite is the hardest while lamp black is softest, Diamond is the hardest and graphite is softest, Coal is the hardest and coke is softest, None of these

options.a: Graphite is the hardest while lamp black is softest
options.b: Diamond is the hardest and graphite is softest
options.c: Coal is the hardest and coke is softest
